body_text:
Why not simply "Metal Alchemist"? Why is Edward Elric known as the 'Fullmetal Alchemist' not simply as 'Metal Alchemist'? Is there any reason besides the names sounding better?
I've only watched the 2nd episode of FMA brotherhood.

What does "Fullmetal" mean? The title is obviously the State Alchemist name of Edward Elric, but what does the word "Fullmetal" mean? I watched both series with dub in my mother language, and in that, Ed was referred as "Steel Alchemist". (translated to English)
